   20: %% Description: Tests supervisor.erl
   21: 
   22: -module(supervisor_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Testserver specific export
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, init_per_testcase/2,
   29: 	 end_per_testcase/2]).
   30: 
   31: %% Internal export
   32: -export([init/1, terminate_all_children/1,
   33:          middle9212/0, gen_server9212/0, handle_info/2, start_registered_name/1]).
   34: 
   35: %% API tests
   36: -export([ sup_start_normal/1, sup_start_ignore_init/1, 
   37: 	  sup_start_ignore_child/1, sup_start_ignore_temporary_child/1,
   38: 	  sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child/1,
   39: 	  sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child_simple/1,
   40:           sup_start_ignore_permanent_child_start_child_simple/1,
   41: 	  sup_start_error_return/1, sup_start_fail/1,
   42:           sup_start_child_returns_error/1,
   43:           sup_start_restart_child_returns_error/1,
   44:           sup_start_child_returns_error_simple/1,
   45: 	  sup_start_map/1, sup_start_map_simple/1,
   46: 	  sup_start_map_faulty_specs/1,
   47: 	  sup_stop_infinity/1, sup_stop_timeout/1, sup_stop_timeout_dynamic/1,
   48: 	  sup_stop_brutal_kill/1, sup_stop_brutal_kill_dynamic/1,
   49:           sup_stop_race/1, sup_stop_non_shutdown_exit_dynamic/1,
   50: 	  child_adm/1, child_adm_simple/1, child_specs/1, child_specs_map/1,
   51: 	  extra_return/1, sup_flags/1]).
   52: 
   53: %% Tests concept permanent, transient and temporary 
   54: -export([ permanent_normal/1, transient_normal/1,
   55: 	  temporary_normal/1,
   56: 	  permanent_shutdown/1, transient_shutdown/1,
   57: 	  temporary_shutdown/1,
   58:           faulty_application_shutdown/1,
   59: 	  permanent_abnormal/1, transient_abnormal/1,
   60: 	  temporary_abnormal/1, temporary_bystander/1]).
   61: 
   62: %% Restart strategy tests 
   63: -export([ multiple_restarts/1,
   64: 	  one_for_one/1,
   65: 	  one_for_one_escalation/1, one_for_all/1,
   66: 	  one_for_all_escalation/1, one_for_all_other_child_fails_restart/1,
   67: 	  simple_one_for_one/1, simple_one_for_one_escalation/1,
   68:           simple_one_for_one_corruption/1,
   69: 	  rest_for_one/1, rest_for_one_escalation/1,
   70: 	  rest_for_one_other_child_fails_restart/1,
   71: 	  simple_one_for_one_extra/1, simple_one_for_one_shutdown/1,
   72:           simple_one_for_one_restart_ignore/1]).
   73: 
   74: %% Significant child tests
   75: -export([ nonsignificant_temporary/1, nonsignificant_transient/1,
   76: 	  significant_temporary/1, significant_transient/1,
   77: 	  significant_simple/1, significant_bystander/1,
   78: 	  significant_escalation/1, significant_upgrade_never_any/1,
   79: 	  significant_upgrade_any_never/1, significant_upgrade_never_all/1,
   80: 	  significant_upgrade_all_never/1, significant_upgrade_any_all/1,
   81: 	  significant_upgrade_all_any/1, significant_upgrade_child/1]).
   82: 
   83: %% Misc tests
   84: -export([child_unlink/1, tree/1, count_children/1, count_children_supervisor/1,
   85: 	 count_restarting_children/1, get_callback_module/1,
   86: 	 do_not_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children/1,
   87: 	 do_not_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children/1,
   88: 	 simple_one_for_one_scale_many_temporary_children/1,
   89:          simple_global_supervisor/1, hanging_restart_loop/1,
   90: 	 hanging_restart_loop_rest_for_one/1,
   91: 	 hanging_restart_loop_simple/1, code_change/1, code_change_map/1,
   92: 	 code_change_simple/1, code_change_simple_map/1,
   93:          order_of_children/1, scale_start_stop_many_children/1,
   94:          format_log_1/1, format_log_2/1, already_started_outside_supervisor/1]).
   95: 
   96: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   97: 
   98: suite() ->
   99:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  100:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
  101: 
  102: all() -> 
  103:     [{group, sup_start}, {group, sup_start_map}, {group, sup_stop}, child_adm,
  104:      child_adm_simple, extra_return, child_specs, child_specs_map, sup_flags,
  105:      multiple_restarts,
  106:      {group, restart_one_for_one},
  107:      {group, restart_one_for_all},
  108:      {group, restart_simple_one_for_one},
  109:      {group, restart_rest_for_one},
  110:      {group, normal_termination},
  111:      {group, shutdown_termination},
  112:      {group, abnormal_termination}, child_unlink, tree,
  113:      {group, significant},
  114:      count_children, count_children_supervisor, count_restarting_children,
  115:      get_callback_module,
  116:      do_not_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children,
  117:      do_not_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children,
  118:      simple_one_for_one_scale_many_temporary_children, temporary_bystander,
  119:      simple_global_supervisor, hanging_restart_loop,
  120:      hanging_restart_loop_rest_for_one, hanging_restart_loop_simple,
  121:      code_change, code_change_map, code_change_simple, code_change_simple_map,
  122:      order_of_children, scale_start_stop_many_children,
  123:      format_log_1, format_log_2, already_started_outside_supervisor].
  124: 
  125: groups() -> 
  126:     [{sup_start, [],
  127:       [sup_start_normal, sup_start_ignore_init,
  128:        sup_start_ignore_child, sup_start_ignore_temporary_child,
  129:        sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child,
  130:        sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child_simple,
  131:        sup_start_ignore_permanent_child_start_child_simple,
  132:        sup_start_error_return, sup_start_fail,
  133:        sup_start_child_returns_error, sup_start_restart_child_returns_error,
  134:        sup_start_child_returns_error_simple
  135:       ]},
  136:      {sup_start_map, [],
  137:       [sup_start_map, sup_start_map_simple, sup_start_map_faulty_specs]},
  138:      {sup_stop, [],
  139:       [sup_stop_infinity, sup_stop_timeout, sup_stop_timeout_dynamic,
  140:        sup_stop_brutal_kill, sup_stop_brutal_kill_dynamic,
  141:        sup_stop_race, sup_stop_non_shutdown_exit_dynamic]},
  142:      {normal_termination, [],
  143:       [permanent_normal, transient_normal, temporary_normal]},
  144:      {shutdown_termination, [],
  145:       [permanent_shutdown, transient_shutdown, temporary_shutdown,
  146:        faulty_application_shutdown]},
  147:      {abnormal_termination, [],
  148:       [permanent_abnormal, transient_abnormal,
  149:        temporary_abnormal]},
  150:      {restart_one_for_one, [],
  151:       [one_for_one, one_for_one_escalation]},
  152:      {restart_one_for_all, [],
  153:       [one_for_all, one_for_all_escalation,
  154:        one_for_all_other_child_fails_restart]},
  155:      {restart_simple_one_for_one, [],
  156:       [simple_one_for_one, simple_one_for_one_shutdown,
  157:        simple_one_for_one_extra, simple_one_for_one_escalation,
  158:        simple_one_for_one_corruption, simple_one_for_one_restart_ignore]},
  159:      {restart_rest_for_one, [],
  160:       [rest_for_one, rest_for_one_escalation,
  161:        rest_for_one_other_child_fails_restart]},
  162:      {significant, [],
  163:       [nonsignificant_temporary, nonsignificant_transient,
  164:        significant_temporary, significant_transient,
  165:        significant_simple, significant_bystander,
  166:        significant_escalation,
  167:        significant_upgrade_never_any, significant_upgrade_any_never,
  168:        significant_upgrade_never_all, significant_upgrade_all_never,
  169:        significant_upgrade_any_all, significant_upgrade_all_any,
  170:        significant_upgrade_child]}].
  171: 
  172: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  173:     Config.
  174: 
  175: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  176:     ok.
  177: 
  178: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  179:     Config.
  180: 
  181: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  182:     Config.
  183: 
  184: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  185:     Config.
  186: 
  187: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
  188:     %% Clean up to avoid unnecessary error reports in the shell
  189:     case whereis(sup_test) of
  190:         SupPid when is_pid(SupPid) ->
  191:             unlink(SupPid),
  192:             exit(SupPid,shutdown),
  193:             ok;
  194:         _ ->
  195:             error
  196:     end,
  197:     ok.
  198: 
  199: start_link(InitResult) ->
  200:     supervisor:start_link({local, sup_test}, ?MODULE, InitResult).
  201: 
  202: %% Simulate different supervisors callback.  
  203: init(fail) ->
  204:     erlang:error(fail);
  205: init(InitResult) ->
  206:     InitResult.
  207: 
  208: %% Respect proplist return of supervisor:count_children
  209: get_child_counts(Supervisor) ->
  210:     Counts = supervisor:count_children(Supervisor),
  211:     [proplists:get_value(specs, Counts),
  212:      proplists:get_value(active, Counts),
  213:      proplists:get_value(supervisors, Counts),
  214:      proplists:get_value(workers, Counts)].
  215: 
  216: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  217: %% Test cases starts here.
  218: %% -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  219: %% Tests that the supervisor process starts correctly and that it can
  220: %% be terminated gracefully.
  221: sup_start_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  222:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  223:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  224:     terminate(Pid, shutdown).
  225: 
  226: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  227: %% Tests what happens if init-callback returns ignore.
  228: sup_start_ignore_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  229:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  230:     ignore = start_link(ignore),
  231:     check_no_exit(100).
  232: 
  233: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  234: %% Tests what happens if init-callback returns ignore.
  235: sup_start_ignore_child(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  236:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  237:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  238:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]}, 
  239: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  240:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
  241: 	      1000, worker, []},
  242: 
  243:     {ok, undefined} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  244:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  245: 
  246:     [{child2, CPid2, worker, []},{child1, undefined, worker, []}]
  247: 	= supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  248:     [2,1,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
  249: 
  250: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  251: %% Tests what happens if child's init-callback returns ignore for a
  252: %% temporary child when ChildSpec is returned directly from supervisor
  253: %% init callback.
  254: %% Child spec shall NOT be saved!!!
  255: sup_start_ignore_temporary_child(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  256:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  257:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]},
  258: 	      temporary, 1000, worker, []},
  259:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary,
  260: 	      1000, worker, []},
  261:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child1,Child2]}}),
  262: 
  263:     [{child2, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  264:     true = is_pid(CPid2),
  265:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
  266: 
  267: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  268: %% Tests what happens if child's init-callback returns ignore for a
  269: %% temporary child when child is started with start_child/2.
  270: %% Child spec shall NOT be saved!!!
  271: sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  272:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  273:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  274:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]},
  275: 	      temporary, 1000, worker, []},
  276:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary,
  277: 	      1000, worker, []},
  278: 
  279:     {ok, undefined} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  280:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  281: 
  282:     [{child2, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  283:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
  284: 
  285: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  286: %% Tests what happens if child's init-callback returns ignore for a
  287: %% temporary child when child is started with start_child/2, and the
  288: %% supervisor is simple_one_for_one.
  289: %% Child spec shall NOT be saved!!!
  290: sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child_simple(Config)
  291:   when is_list(Config) ->
  292:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  293:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]},
  294: 	      temporary, 1000, worker, []},
  295:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child1]}}),
  296: 
  297:     {ok, undefined} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  298:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  299: 
  300:     [{undefined, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  301:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
  302: 
  303: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  304: %% Tests what happens if child's init-callback returns ignore for a
  305: %% permanent child when child is started with start_child/2, and the
  306: %% supervisor is simple_one_for_one.
  307: %% Child spec shall NOT be saved!!!
  308: sup_start_ignore_permanent_child_start_child_simple(Config)
  309:   when is_list(Config) ->
  310:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  311:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]},
  312: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  313:     {ok, Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child1]}}),
  314: 
  315:     {ok, undefined} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  316:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  317: 
  318:     [{undefined, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  319:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  320: 
  321:     %% Regression test: check that the supervisor terminates without error.
  322:     exit(Pid, shutdown),
  323:     check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown).
  324: 
  325: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  326: %% Tests what happens if init-callback returns a invalid value.
  327: sup_start_error_return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  328:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  329:     %% The bad return is processed in supervisor:init/1
  330:     InitResult = invalid,
  331:     {error, {bad_return, {?MODULE, init, InitResult}}} =
  332:         start_link(InitResult),
  333:     check_no_exit(100).
  334: 
  335: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  336: %% Tests what happens if init-callback fails.
  337: sup_start_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  338:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  339:     %% The exception is processed in gen_server:init_it/2
  340:     ErrorReason = fail,
  341:     {error, {ErrorReason, _Stacktrace}} = start_link(ErrorReason),
  342:     check_no_exit(100).
  343: 
  344: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  345: %% Test what happens when the start function for a child returns
  346: %% {error,Reason} or some other term().
  347: sup_start_restart_child_returns_error(_Config) ->
  348:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  349:     Child = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
  350:               permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  351:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  352: 
  353:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  354:     {error,{function_clause,_}} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test,child1),
  355: 
  356:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  357:     ok.
  358: 
  359: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  360: %% Test what happens when the start function for a child returns
  361: %% {error,Reason} or some other term().
  362: sup_start_child_returns_error(_Config) ->
  363:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  364:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [{return,{error,reason}}]},
  365:               permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  366:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [{return,error_reason}]},
  367:               permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  368:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  369: 
  370:     {error,{reason,_}} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,Child1),
  371:     {error,{error_reason,_}} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,Child2),
  372: 
  373:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  374:     ok.
  375: 
  376: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  377: %% Test what happens when the start function for a child returns
  378: %% {error,Reason} - simple_one_for_one
  379: sup_start_child_returns_error_simple(_Config) ->
  380:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  381:     Child = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  382:              permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  383:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  384: 
  385:     {error,reason} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,[{return,{error,reason}}]),
  386:     {error,error_reason} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,[{return,error_reason}]),
  387: 
  388:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  389:     ok.
  390: 
  391: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  392: %% Tests that the supervisor process starts correctly with map
  393: %% startspec, and that the full childspec can be read.
  394: sup_start_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  395:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  396:     Child1 = #{id=>child1, start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
  397:     Child2 = #{id=>child2,
  398: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  399: 	       shutdown=>brutal_kill},
  400:     Child3 = #{id=>child3,
  401: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  402: 	       type=>supervisor},
  403:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child1,Child2,Child3]}}),
  404: 
  405:     %% Check default values
  406:     {ok,#{id:=child1,
  407: 	  start:={supervisor_1,start_child,[]},
  408: 	  restart:=permanent,
  409: 	  shutdown:=5000,
  410: 	  type:=worker,
  411: 	  modules:=[supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, child1),
  412:     {ok,#{id:=child2,
  413: 	  start:={supervisor_1,start_child,[]},
  414: 	  restart:=permanent,
  415: 	  shutdown:=brutal_kill,
  416: 	  type:=worker,
  417: 	  modules:=[supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, child2),
  418:     {ok,#{id:=child3,
  419: 	  start:={supervisor_1,start_child,[]},
  420: 	  restart:=permanent,
  421: 	  shutdown:=infinity,
  422: 	  type:=supervisor,
  423: 	  modules:=[supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, child3),
  424:     {error,not_found} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, child4),
  425:     terminate(Pid, shutdown).
  426: 
  427: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  428: %% Tests that the supervisor process starts correctly with map
  429: %% startspec, and that the full childspec can be read when using
  430: %% simple_one_for_one strategy.
  431: sup_start_map_simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  432:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  433:     SupFlags = #{strategy=>simple_one_for_one},
  434:     ChildSpec = #{id=>undefined,
  435: 		  start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  436: 		  restart=>temporary},
  437:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {SupFlags, [ChildSpec]}}),
  438: 
  439:     {ok, Child1} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  440:     {ok, Child2} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  441:     {ok, Child3} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  442: 
  443:     Spec = ChildSpec#{type=>worker, shutdown=>5000, modules=>[supervisor_1],
  444: 		      significant=>false},
  445: 
  446:     {ok, Spec} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, Child1),
  447:     {ok, Spec} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, Child2),
  448:     {ok, Spec} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, Child3),
  449:     {error,not_found} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, self()),
  450:     terminate(Pid, shutdown).
  451: 
  452: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  453: %% Tests that the supervisor produces good error messages when start-
  454: %% and child specs are faulty.
  455: sup_start_map_faulty_specs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  456:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  457:     Child1 = #{start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
  458:     Child2 = #{id=>child2},
  459:     Child3 = #{id=>child3,
  460: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  461: 	       silly_flag=>true},
  462:     Child4 = child4,
  463:     {error,{start_spec,missing_id}} = start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child1]}}),
  464:     {error,{start_spec,missing_start}} = start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child2]}}),
  465:     {ok,Pid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child3]}}),
  466:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
  467:     {error,{start_spec,{invalid_child_spec,child4}}} =
  468: 	start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child4]}}).
  469: 
  470: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  471: %% See sup_stop/1 when Shutdown = infinity, this walue is allowed for
  472: %% children of type supervisor _AND_ worker.
  473: sup_stop_infinity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  474:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  475:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  476:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, 
  477: 	      permanent, infinity, supervisor, []},
  478:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
  479: 	      infinity, worker, []},
  480:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  481:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  482:     link(CPid1),
  483:     link(CPid2),
  484: 
  485:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  486:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, shutdown),
  487:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, shutdown).
  488: 
  489: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  490: %% See sup_stop/1 when Shutdown = 1000
  491: sup_stop_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  492:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  493:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  494:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, 
  495: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  496:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
  497: 	      1000, worker, []},
  498:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  499:     link(CPid1),
  500:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  501:     link(CPid2),
  502: 
  503:     CPid2 ! {sleep, 200000},
  504: 
  505:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  506: 
  507:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, shutdown),
  508:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, killed).
  509: 
  510: sup_stop_timeout_dynamic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  511:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  512:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000, worker, []},
  513:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  514:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  515:     link(CPid1),
  516:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  517:     link(CPid2),
  518:     CPid2 ! {sleep, 200000},
  519:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  520:     check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown),
  521:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, shutdown),
  522:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, killed).
  523: 
  524: 
  525: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  526: %% See sup_stop/1 when Shutdown = brutal_kill
  527: sup_stop_brutal_kill(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  528:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  529:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  530:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, 
  531: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  532:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
  533: 	      brutal_kill, worker, []},
  534:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  535:     link(CPid1),
  536:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  537:     link(CPid2),
  538: 
  539:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  540: 
  541:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, shutdown),
  542:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, killed).
  543: 
  544: sup_stop_brutal_kill_dynamic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  545:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  546:     Child = {child, {supervisor_4, start_child, []}, temporary, brutal_kill, worker, []},
  547:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  548:     CPids = lists:map(
  549:         fun (_) ->
  550:             {ok, CPid} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  551:             link(CPid),
  552:             CPid
  553:         end,
  554:         lists:seq(1, 10)),
  555:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  556:     check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown),
  557:     lists:foreach(
  558:         fun (CPid) ->
  559:             check_exit_reason(CPid, killed)
  560:         end,
  561:         CPids
  562:     ).
  563: 
  564: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  565: %% Tests that a supervisor completes its shutdown properly while children
  566: %% exit by themselves for reasons other than shutdown
  567: sup_stop_race(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  568:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  569:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  570:     {ok, CPidA} = supervisor:start_child(Pid,
  571:         #{id => child_a,
  572:           start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  573:           restart => temporary,
  574:           shutdown => 1000}),
  575:     link(CPidA),
  576:     CPids = lists:foldl(
  577:         fun ({Restart, Reason}, Acc) ->
  578:             {ok, CPid} = supervisor:start_child(Pid,
  579:                 #{id => {child, make_ref()},
  580:                   start => {supervisor_4, start_child, [Reason]},
  581:                   restart => Restart,
  582:                   shutdown => 1000
  583:                 }),
  584:             link(CPid),
  585:             Acc#{CPid => Reason}
  586:         end,
  587:         #{},
  588:         [
  589:             {Restart, Reason}
  590:             || Restart <- [temporary, transient, permanent],
  591:                Reason <- [normal, shutdown, {shutdown, test}, other]
  592:         ]
  593:     ),
  594:     {ok, CPidZ} = supervisor:start_child(Pid,
  595:         #{
  596:             id => child_z,
  597:             start => {supervisor_2, start_child, [1000]},
  598:             restart => temporary,
  599:             shutdown => 2000
  600:         }),
  601:     link(CPidZ),
  602:     Self = self(),
  603:     spawn_link(
  604:         fun () ->
  605:             timer:sleep(200),
  606:             maps:foreach(
  607:                 fun (CPid, _) ->
  608:                     CPid ! stop
  609:                 end,
  610:                 CPids
  611:             ),
  612:             unlink(Self)
  613:         end
  614:     ),
  615:     ok = terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  616:     check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown),
  617:     check_exit_reason(CPidZ, shutdown),
  618:     maps:foreach(
  619:         fun (CPid, Reason) ->
  620:             check_exit_reason(CPid, Reason)
  621:         end,
  622:         CPids),
  623:     check_exit_reason(CPidA, shutdown).
  624: 
  625: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  626: %% Tests that a simple_one_for_one supervisor shuts down correctly when
  627: %% some children exit with a reason other than shutdown
  628: sup_stop_non_shutdown_exit_dynamic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  629:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  630:     lists:foreach(
  631:         fun (Restart) ->
  632:             Child = {child, {supervisor_4, start_child, []}, Restart, 5000, worker, []},
  633:             {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  634:             CPids = lists:foldl(
  635:                 fun (Reason, Acc) ->
  636:                     {ok, CPid} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, [Reason]),
  637:                     link(CPid),
  638:                     Acc#{CPid => Reason}
  639:                 end,
  640:                 #{},
  641:                 [normal, shutdown, {shutdown, test}, other]
  642:             ),
  643:             ok = terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  644:             check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown),
  645:             maps:foreach(
  646:                 fun (CPid, Reason) ->
  647:                     check_exit_reason(CPid, Reason)
  648:                 end,
  649:                 CPids)
  650:         end,
  651:         [temporary, transient, permanent]
  652:     ).
  653: 
  654: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  655: %% The start function provided to start a child may return {ok, Pid}
  656: %% or {ok, Pid, Info}, if it returns the latter check that the
  657: %% supervisor ignores the Info, and includes it unchanged in return
  658: %% from start_child/2 and restart_child/2.
  659: extra_return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  660:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  661:     Child = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [extra_return]}, 
  662: 	     permanent, 1000,
  663: 	     worker, []},
  664:     {ok, _Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  665:     [{child1, CPid, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  666:     link(CPid),
  667:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, hej),
  668:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, hej),
  669:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, hej),
  670:     {error, running} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  671:     {error, running} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  672:     [{child1, CPid, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  673:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  674: 
  675:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  676:     check_exit_reason(CPid, shutdown),
  677:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  678:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  679: 
  680:     {ok, CPid2,extra_return} =
  681: 	supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  682:     [{child1, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  683:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  684: 
  685:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  686:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  687:     ok = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  688:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  689:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  690:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  691: 
  692:     {ok, CPid3, extra_return} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
  693:     [{child1, CPid3, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  694:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  695: 
  696:     %% Check that it can be automatically restarted
  697:     terminate(CPid3, abnormal),
  698:     [{child1, CPid4, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  699:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  700:     if (not is_pid(CPid4)) orelse CPid4=:=CPid3 ->
  701:             ct:fail({not_restarted,CPid3,CPid4});
  702:        true ->
  703:             ok
  704:     end.
  705: 
  706: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  707: %% Test API functions start_child/2, terminate_child/2, delete_child/2
  708: %% restart_child/2, which_children/1, count_children/1. Only correct
  709: %% childspecs are used, handling of incorrect childspecs is tested in
  710: %% child_specs/1.
  711: child_adm(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  712:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  713:     Child = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
  714: 	     worker, []},
  715:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  716: 
  717:     %% Test that supervisors of static nature are hibernated after start
  718:     {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
  719: 	process_info(Pid, current_function),
  720: 
  721:     [{child1, CPid, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  722:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  723:     link(CPid),
  724:     %% Start of an already runnig process 
  725:     {error,{already_started, CPid}} =
  726: 	supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
  727: 
  728:     %% Termination
  729:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, hej),
  730:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call, _}}} =
  731: 	(catch supervisor:terminate_child(foo, child1)),
  732:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  733:     check_exit_reason(CPid, shutdown),
  734:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  735:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  736:     %% Like deleting something that does not exist, it will succeed!
  737:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  738: 
  739:     %% Start of already existing but not running process 
  740:     {error,already_present} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
  741: 
  742:     %% Restart
  743:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  744:     [{child1, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  745:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  746:     {error, running} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  747:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child2),
  748: 
  749:     %% Deletion
  750:     {error, running} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  751:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, hej),
  752:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call, _}}} =
  753: 	(catch supervisor:delete_child(foo, child1)),
  754:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  755:     ok = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  756:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  757:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  758:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  759: 
  760:     %% Start
  761:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call, _}}} =
  762: 	(catch supervisor:start_child(foo, Child)),
  763:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
  764:     [{child1, CPid3, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  765:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  766: 
  767:     %% Terminate with Pid not allowed when not simple_one_for_one
  768:     {error,not_found} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, CPid3),
  769:     [{child1, CPid3, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  770:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  771: 
  772:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call,[foo,which_children,infinity]}}}
  773: 	= (catch supervisor:which_children(foo)),
  774:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call,[foo,count_children,infinity]}}}
  775: 	= (catch supervisor:count_children(foo)),
  776:     ok.
  777: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  778: %% The API functions terminate_child/2, delete_child/2 restart_child/2
  779: %% are not valid for a simple_one_for_one supervisor check that the
  780: %% correct error message is returned.
  781: child_adm_simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  782:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
  783: 	     worker, []},
  784:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  785: 
  786:        %% Test that supervisors of dynamic nature are not hibernated after start
  787:     {current_function, {_, Function, _}} =
  788: 	process_info(Pid, current_function),
  789:     true = Function =/= hibernate,
  790: 
  791:     %% In simple_one_for_one all children are added dynamically 
  792:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  793:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  794: 
  795:     %% Start
  796:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call, _}}} =
  797: 	(catch supervisor:start_child(foo, [])),
  798:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  799:     [{undefined, CPid1, worker, []}] =
  800: 	supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  801:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  802: 
  803:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  804:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  805:     2 = length(Children),
  806:     true = lists:member({undefined, CPid2, worker, []}, Children),
  807:     true = lists:member({undefined, CPid1, worker, []}, Children),
  808:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  809: 
  810:     %% Termination
  811:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  812:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  813:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,CPid1),
  814:     [_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  815:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  816:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(CPid1),
  817:     %% Terminate non-existing proccess is ok
  818:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,CPid1),
  819:     [_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  820:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  821:     %% Terminate pid which is not a child of this supervisor is not ok
  822:     NoChildPid = spawn_link(fun() -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
  823:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, NoChildPid),
  824:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(NoChildPid),
  825: 
  826:     %% Restart
  827:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  828: 
  829:     %% Deletion
  830:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  831:     ok.
  832: 
  833: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  834: %% Tests child specs (tuple form), invalid formats should be rejected.
  835: child_specs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  836:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  837:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  838:     {error, _} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, hej),
  839: 
  840:     %% Bad child specs 
  841:     B1 = {child, mfa, permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  842:     B2 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, prmanent, 1000, worker, []}, 
  843:     B3 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, -10, worker, []},
  844:     B4 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, 10, wrker, []},
  845:     B5 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, 1000, worker, dy},
  846:     B6 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, 1000, worker, [1,2,3]},
  847: 
  848:     {error, {invalid_mfa,mfa}} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B1),
  849:     {error, {invalid_restart_type, prmanent}} =
  850: 	supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B2),
  851:     {error,  {invalid_shutdown,-10}}
  852: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B3),
  853:     {error, {invalid_child_type,wrker}}
  854: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B4),
  855:     {error, {invalid_modules,dy}}
  856: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B5),
  857: 
  858:     {error, {badarg, _}} = supervisor:check_childspecs(B1), % should be list
  859:     {error, {invalid_mfa,mfa}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B1]),
  860:     {error, {invalid_restart_type,prmanent}} =
  861: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B2]),
  862:     {error, {invalid_shutdown,-10}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B3]),
  863:     {error, {invalid_child_type,wrker}}
  864: 	= supervisor:check_childspecs([B4]),
  865:     {error, {invalid_modules,dy}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B5]),
  866:     {error, {invalid_module, 1}} =
  867: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B6]),
  868: 
  869:     lists:foreach(
  870: 	fun (ChildSpec) ->
  871: 	    ok = supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec])
  872: 	end,
  873: 	[
  874: 	    {child, {m, f, [a]}, Restart, Shutdown, Type, Modules}
  875: 	    ||
  876: 		Restart <- [permanent, transient, temporary],
  877: 		Shutdown <- [0, 1000, infinity, brutal_kill],
  878: 		Type <- [supervisor, worker],
  879: 		Modules <- [dynamic, [], [m], [m1, m2]]
  880: 	]
  881:     ),
  882: 
  883:     C1 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, infinity, supervisor, []},
  884:     C2 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, 1000, supervisor, []},
  885: 
  886:     {error,{duplicate_child_name,child}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([C1,C2]),
  887: 
  888:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  889: 
  890:     %% Faulty child specs in supervisor start
  891:     {error, {start_spec, {invalid_mfa, mfa}}} =
  892: 	 start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [B1]}}),
  893:     {error, {start_spec, {invalid_restart_type, prmanent}}} =
  894: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [B2]}}),
  895: 
  896:     %% simple_one_for_one needs exactly one child
  897:     {error,{bad_start_spec,[]}} =
  898: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  899:     {error,{bad_start_spec,[C1,C2]}} =
  900: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [C1,C2]}}),
  901: 
  902:     ok.
  903: 
  904: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  905: %% Tests child specs (map form), invalid formats should be rejected.
  906: child_specs_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  907:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  908:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, []}}),
  909:     {error, _} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, hej),
  910: 
  911:     CS0 = #{id => child, start => {m, f, [a]}},
  912: 
  913:     %% Bad child specs 
  914:     B1 = #{},
  915:     B2 = #{id => child},
  916:     B3 = #{start => {m, f, [a]}},
  917:     B4 = CS0#{start => mfa},
  918:     B5 = CS0#{restart => prmanent}, 
  919:     B6 = CS0#{shutdown => -10},
  920:     B7 = CS0#{type => wrker},
  921:     B8 = CS0#{modules => dy},
  922:     B9 = CS0#{modules => [1,2,3]},
  923:     B10 = CS0#{significant => 'maybe'},
  924: 
  925:     {error, missing_id} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B1),
  926:     {error, missing_start} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B2),
  927:     {error, missing_id} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B3),
  928:     {error, {invalid_mfa,mfa}} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B4),
  929:     {error, {invalid_restart_type, prmanent}} =
  930: 	supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B5),
  931:     {error,  {invalid_shutdown,-10}}
  932: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B6),
  933:     {error, {invalid_child_type,wrker}}
  934: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B7),
  935:     {error, {invalid_modules,dy}}
  936: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B8),
  937: 
  938:     {error, {badarg, _}} = supervisor:check_childspecs(B1), % should be list
  939:     {error, missing_id} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B1]),
  940:     {error, missing_start} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B2]),
  941:     {error, missing_id} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B3]),
  942:     {error, {invalid_mfa,mfa}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B4]),
  943:     {error, {invalid_restart_type,prmanent}} =
  944: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B5]),
  945:     {error, {invalid_shutdown,-10}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B6]),
  946:     {error, {invalid_child_type,wrker}}
  947: 	= supervisor:check_childspecs([B7]),
  948:     {error, {invalid_modules,dy}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B8]),
  949:     {error, {invalid_module, 1}} =
  950: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B9]),
  951:     {error, {invalid_significant, 'maybe'}} =
  952: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B10]),
  953: 
  954:     CSFilter = fun (CS) -> maps:filter(fun (_, V) -> V =/= undefined end, CS) end,
  955:     lists:foreach(
  956: 	fun
  957: 	    ({never, ChildSpec = #{significant := true}}) ->
  958: 		ChildSpec1 = CSFilter(ChildSpec),
  959: 		{error, {bad_combination, BadOpts}} =
  960: 		    supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec1], never),
  961: 		[{auto_shutdown, never}, {significant, true}] = lists:sort(BadOpts);
  962: 	    ({AutoShutdown, ChildSpec = #{restart := undefined, significant := true}}) ->
  963: 		ChildSpec1 = CSFilter(ChildSpec),
  964: 		{error, {bad_combination, BadOpts}} =
  965: 		    supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec1], AutoShutdown),
  966: 		[{restart, permanent}, {significant, true}] = lists:sort(BadOpts);
  967: 	    ({AutoShutdown, ChildSpec = #{restart := permanent, significant := true}}) ->
  968: 		ChildSpec1 = CSFilter(ChildSpec),
  969: 		{error, {bad_combination, BadOpts}} =
  970: 		    supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec1], AutoShutdown),
  971: 		[{restart, permanent}, {significant, true}] = lists:sort(BadOpts);
  972: 	    ({AutoShutdown, ChildSpec}) ->
  973: 		ChildSpec1 = CSFilter(ChildSpec),
  974: 		ok = supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec1], AutoShutdown)
  975: 	end,
  976: 	[
  977: 	    {AutoShutdown,
  978: 	     CS0#{restart => Restart,
  979: 		  shutdown => Shutdown,
  980: 		  type => Type,
  981: 		  modules => Modules,
  982: 		  significant => Significant,
  983: 		  dummy => Dummy}}
  984: 	    ||
  985: 		AutoShutdown <- [undefined, never, any_significant, all_significant],
  986: 		Restart <- [undefined, permanent, transient, temporary],
  987: 		Shutdown <- [undefined, 0, 1000, infinity, brutal_kill],
  988: 		Type <- [undefined, supervisor, worker],
  989: 		Modules <- [undefined, dynamic, [], [m], [m1, m2]],
  990: 		Significant <- [undefined, true, false],
  991: 		Dummy <- [undefined, dummy]
  992: 	]
  993:     ),
  994: 
  995:     {error,{duplicate_child_name,child}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([CS0,CS0]),
  996: 
  997:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  998: 
  999:     %% Faulty child specs in supervisor start
 1000:     {error, {start_spec, {invalid_mfa, mfa}}} =
 1001: 	 start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [B4]}}),
 1002:     {error, {start_spec, {invalid_restart_type, prmanent}}} =
 1003: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [B5]}}),
 1004: 
 1005:     %% simple_one_for_one needs exactly one child
 1006:     {error,{bad_start_spec,[]}} =
 1007: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1008:     {error,{bad_start_spec,[CS0,CS0]}} =
 1009: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [CS0,CS0]}}),
 1010: 
 1011:     %% auto_shutdown => never should not accept significant children
 1012:     {error, {start_spec, {bad_combination, _}}} =
 1013: 	start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [CS0#{significant => true}]}}),
 1014: 
 1015:     ok.
 1016: 
 1017: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1018: %% Test error handling of supervisor flags
 1019: sup_flags(_Config) ->
 1020:     process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 1021:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_strategy,_}}} =
 1022: 	start_link({ok, {{none_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1023:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_strategy,_}}} =
 1024: 	start_link({ok, {#{strategy=>none_for_one}, []}}),
 1025:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_intensity,_}}} =
 1026: 	start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, infinity, 3600}, []}}),
 1027:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_intensity,_}}} =
 1028: 	start_link({ok, {#{intensity=>infinity}, []}}),
 1029:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_period,_}}} =
 1030: 	start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 0}, []}}),
 1031:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_period,_}}} =
 1032: 	start_link({ok, {#{period=>0}, []}}),
 1033:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_period,_}}} =
 1034: 	start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, infinity}, []}}),
 1035:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_period,_}}} =
 1036: 	start_link({ok, {#{period=>infinity}, []}}),
 1037:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_auto_shutdown,_}}} =
 1038: 	start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown=>sometimes}, []}}),
 1039: 
 1040:     %% SupFlags other than a map or a 3-tuple
 1041:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_type,_}}} =
 1042: 	start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2}, []}}),
 1043: 
 1044:     %% Unexpected flags are ignored
 1045:     {ok,Pid} = start_link({ok,{#{silly_flag=>true},[]}}),
 1046:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
 1047: 
 1048:     ok.
 1049: 
 1050: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1051: %% A permanent child should always be restarted.
 1052: permanent_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1053:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1054:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1055: 	      worker, []},
 1056: 
 1057:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1058: 
 1059:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, normal),
 1060: 
 1061:     [{child1, Pid ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1062:     case is_pid(Pid) of
 1063: 	true ->
 1064: 	    ok;
 1065: 	false ->
 1066: 	    ct:fail({permanent_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1067:     end,
 1068:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1069: 
 1070: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1071: %% A transient child should not be restarted if it exits with reason
 1072: %% normal.
 1073: transient_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1074:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1075:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, transient, 1000,
 1076: 	      worker, []},
 1077: 
 1078:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1079: 
 1080:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, normal),
 1081: 
 1082:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1083:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1084: 
 1085: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1086: %% A temporary process should never be restarted.
 1087: temporary_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1088:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1089:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 1090: 	      worker, []},
 1091: 
 1092:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1093: 
 1094:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, normal),
 1095: 
 1096:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1097:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1098: 
 1099: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1100: %% A permanent child should always be restarted.
 1101: permanent_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1102:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1103:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1104: 	      worker, []},
 1105: 
 1106:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1107: 
 1108:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, shutdown),
 1109: 
 1110:     [{child1, CPid2 ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1111:     case is_pid(CPid2) of
 1112: 	true ->
 1113: 	    ok;
 1114: 	false ->
 1115: 	    ct:fail({permanent_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1116:     end,
 1117:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1118: 
 1119:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child1, {shutdown, some_info}),
 1120: 
 1121:     [{child1, CPid3 ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1122:     case is_pid(CPid3) of
 1123: 	true ->
 1124: 	    ok;
 1125: 	false ->
 1126: 	    ct:fail({permanent_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1127:     end,
 1128: 
 1129:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1130: 
 1131: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1132: %% A transient child should not be restarted if it exits with reason
 1133: %% shutdown or {shutdown,Term}.
 1134: transient_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1135:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1136:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, transient, 1000,
 1137: 	      worker, []},
 1138: 
 1139:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1140: 
 1141:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, shutdown),
 1142: 
 1143:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1144:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1145: 
 1146:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
 1147: 
 1148:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child1, {shutdown, some_info}),
 1149: 
 1150:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1151:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1152: 
 1153: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1154: %% A temporary process should never be restarted.
 1155: temporary_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1156:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1157:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 1158: 	      worker, []},
 1159: 
 1160:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1161: 
 1162:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, shutdown),
 1163: 
 1164:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1165:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1166: 
 1167:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1168: 
 1169:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child1, {shutdown, some_info}),
 1170: 
 1171:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1172:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1173: 
 1174: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1175: %% Faulty application should shutdown and pass on errors
 1176: faulty_application_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1177: 
 1178:     %% Set some paths
 1179:     AppDir  = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "app_faulty"),
 1180:     EbinDir = filename:join(AppDir, "ebin"),
 1181: 
 1182:     %% Start faulty app
 1183:     code:add_patha(EbinDir),
 1184: 
 1185:     %% {error,
 1186:     %%  {{shutdown,
 1187:     %%    {failed_to_start_child,
 1188:     %% 	app_faulty,
 1189:     %% 	{undef,
 1190:     %% 	 [{an_undefined_module_with,an_undefined_function,[argument1,argument2],
 1191:     %% 	   []},
 1192:     %% 	  {app_faulty_server,init,1,
 1193:     %% 	   [{file,"app_faulty/src/app_faulty_server.erl"},{line,16}]},
 1194:     %% 	  {gen_server,init_it,6,
 1195:     %% 	   [{file,"gen_server.erl"},{line,304}]},
 1196:     %% 	  {proc_lib,init_p_do_apply,3,
 1197:     %% 	   [{file,"proc_lib.erl"},{line,227}]}]}}},
 1198:     %%   {app_faulty,start,[normal,[]]}}}
 1199: 
 1200:     {error, Error} = application:start(app_faulty),
 1201:     {{shutdown, {failed_to_start_child,app_faulty,{undef, CallStack}}},
 1202:      {app_faulty,start,_}} = Error,
 1203:     [{an_undefined_module_with,an_undefined_function,_,_}|_] = CallStack,
 1204:     ok = application:unload(app_faulty),
 1205:     ok.
 1206: 
 1207: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1208: %% A permanent child should always be restarted.
 1209: permanent_abnormal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1210:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1211:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1212: 	      worker, []},
 1213: 
 1214:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1215:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1216: 
 1217:     [{child1, Pid ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1218:     case is_pid(Pid) of
 1219: 	true ->
 1220: 	    ok;
 1221: 	false ->
 1222: 	    ct:fail({permanent_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1223:     end,
 1224:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1225: 
 1226: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1227: %% A transient child should be restarted if it exits with reason abnormal.
 1228: transient_abnormal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1229:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1230:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, transient, 1000,
 1231: 	      worker, []},
 1232: 
 1233:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1234:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1235: 
 1236:     [{child1, Pid ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1237:     case is_pid(Pid) of
 1238: 	true ->
 1239: 	    ok;
 1240: 	false ->
 1241: 	    ct:fail({transient_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1242:     end,
 1243:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1244: 
 1245: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1246: %% A temporary process should never be restarted.
 1247: temporary_abnormal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1248:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1249:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 1250: 	      worker, []},
 1251: 
 1252:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1253:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1254: 
 1255:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1256:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1257: 
 1258: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1259: %% A temporary process killed as part of a rest_for_one or one_for_all
 1260: %% restart strategy should not be restarted given its args are not
 1261: %% saved. Otherwise the supervisor hits its limit and crashes.
 1262: temporary_bystander(_Config) ->
 1263:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 100,
 1264: 	      worker, []},
 1265:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 100,
 1266: 	      worker, []},
 1267:     {ok, SupPid1} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{one_for_all, 2, 300}, []}}),
 1268:     {ok, SupPid2} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{rest_for_one, 2, 300}, []}}),
 1269:     unlink(SupPid1), % otherwise we crash with it
 1270:     unlink(SupPid2), % otherwise we crash with it
 1271:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid1, Child1),
 1272:     {ok, _CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid1, Child2),
 1273:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid2, Child1),
 1274:     {ok, _CPid4} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid2, Child2),
 1275:     terminate(SupPid1, CPid1, child1, normal),
 1276:     terminate(SupPid2, CPid3, child1, normal),
 1277:     timer:sleep(350),
 1278:     catch link(SupPid1),
 1279:     catch link(SupPid2),
 1280:     %% The supervisor would die attempting to restart child2
 1281:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(SupPid1),
 1282:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(SupPid2),
 1283:     %% Child2 has not been restarted
 1284:     [{child1, _, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid1),
 1285:     [{child1, _, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid2).
 1286: 
 1287: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1288: %% Test restarting a process multiple times, being careful not
 1289: %% to exceed the maximum restart frquency.
 1290: multiple_restarts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1291:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1292:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 1293: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1294: 	       restart => permanent,
 1295: 	       shutdown => brutal_kill,
 1296: 	       type => worker,
 1297: 	       modules => []},
 1298:     SupFlags = #{strategy => one_for_one,
 1299: 		 intensity => 1,
 1300: 		 period => 1},
 1301:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {SupFlags, []}}),
 1302:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1303: 
 1304:     %% Terminate the process several times, but being careful
 1305:     %% not to exceed the maximum restart intensity.
 1306:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1307:     _ = [begin
 1308: 	     receive after 2100 -> ok end,
 1309: 	     [{_, Pid, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1310: 	     terminate(SupPid, Pid, child1, abnormal)
 1311: 	 end || _ <- [1,2,3]],
 1312: 
 1313:     %% Verify that the supervisor is still alive and clean up.
 1314:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, child1),
 1315:     ok = supervisor:delete_child(SupPid, child1),
 1316:     exit(SupPid, kill),
 1317:     ok.
 1318: 
 1319: 
 1320: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1321: %% Test the one_for_one base case.
 1322: one_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1323:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1324:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1325: 	      worker, []},
 1326:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1327: 	      worker, []},
 1328:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1329:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1330:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1331: 
 1332:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1333:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1334:     if length(Children) == 2 ->
 1335: 	    case lists:keysearch(CPid2, 2, Children) of
 1336: 		{value, _} -> ok;
 1337: 		_ ->  ct:fail(bad_child)
 1338: 	    end;
 1339:        true ->  ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1340:     end,
 1341:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1342: 
 1343:     %% Test restart frequency property
 1344:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1345: 
 1346:     [{Id4, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1347:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, Id4, abnormal),
 1348:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1349: 
 1350: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1351: %% Test restart escalation on a one_for_one supervisor.
 1352: one_for_one_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1353:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1354: 
 1355:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1356: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1357: 	      worker, []},
 1358:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1359: 	      worker, []},
 1360: 
 1361:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1362:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1363:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1364:     link(CPid2),
 1365: 
 1366:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1367:     check_exit([SupPid, CPid2]).
 1368: 
 1369: 
 1370: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1371: %% Test the one_for_all base case.
 1372: one_for_all(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1373:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1374: 
 1375:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1376: 	     worker, []},
 1377:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1378: 	     worker, []},
 1379:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_all, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1380:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1381:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1382:     link(CPid2),
 1383: 
 1384:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1385:     check_exit([CPid2]),
 1386: 
 1387:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1388:     if length(Children) == 2 -> ok;
 1389:        true ->
 1390: 	    ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1391:     end,
 1392: 
 1393:     %% Test that no old children is still alive
 1394:     not_in_child_list([CPid1, CPid2], lists:map(fun({_,P,_,_}) -> P end, Children)),
 1395: 
 1396:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1397: 
 1398:     %%% Test restart frequency property
 1399:     [{Id3, Pid3, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1400:     terminate(SupPid, Pid3, Id3, abnormal),
 1401:     [{Id4, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1402:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, Id4, abnormal),
 1403:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1404: 
 1405: 
 1406: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1407: %% Test restart escalation on a one_for_all supervisor.
 1408: one_for_all_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1409:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1410: 
 1411:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1412: 	     worker, []},
 1413:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1414: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1415: 	     worker, []},
 1416:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_all, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1417:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1418:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1419:     link(CPid2),
 1420: 
 1421:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1422:     check_exit([CPid2, SupPid]).
 1423: 
 1424: 
 1425: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1426: %% Test that the supervisor terminates a restarted child when a different
 1427: %% child fails to start.
 1428: one_for_all_other_child_fails_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1429:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1430:     Self = self(),
 1431:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_3, start_child, [child1, Self]},
 1432: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1433:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_3, start_child, [child2, Self]},
 1434: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1435:     Children = [Child1, Child2],
 1436:     StarterFun = fun() ->
 1437: 	    {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_all, 3, 3600}, Children}}),
 1438: 	    Self ! {sup_pid, SupPid},
 1439: 	    receive {stop, Self} -> ok end
 1440:     end,
 1441:     StarterPid = spawn_link(StarterFun),
 1442:     Ok = {{ok, undefined}, Self},
 1443:     %% Let the children start.
 1444:     Child1Pid = receive {child1, Pid1} -> Pid1 end,
 1445:     Child1Pid ! Ok,
 1446:     Child2Pid = receive {child2, Pid2} -> Pid2 end,
 1447:     Child2Pid ! Ok,
 1448:     %% Supervisor started.
 1449:     SupPid = receive {sup_pid, Pid} -> Pid end,
 1450:     link(SupPid),
 1451:     exit(Child1Pid, die),
 1452:     %% Let child1 restart but don't let child2.
 1453:     Child1Pid2  = receive {child1, Pid3} -> Pid3 end,
 1454:     Child1Pid2Ref = erlang:monitor(process, Child1Pid2),
 1455:     Child1Pid2 ! Ok,
 1456:     Child2Pid2 = receive {child2, Pid4} -> Pid4 end,
 1457:     Child2Pid2 ! {{stop, normal}, Self},
 1458:     %% Check child1 is terminated.
 1459:     receive
 1460: 	{'DOWN', Child1Pid2Ref, _, _, shutdown} ->
 1461: 	    ok;
 1462: 	{_childName, _Pid} ->
 1463: 	    exit(SupPid, kill),
 1464: 	    check_exit([StarterPid, SupPid]),
 1465: 	    ct:fail({restarting_child_not_terminated, Child1Pid2})
 1466:     end,
 1467:     %% Let the restart complete.
 1468:     Child1Pid3 = receive {child1, Pid5} -> Pid5 end,
 1469:     Child1Pid3 ! Ok,
 1470:     Child2Pid3 = receive {child2, Pid6} -> Pid6 end,
 1471:     Child2Pid3 ! Ok,
 1472:     StarterPid ! {stop, Self},
 1473:     check_exit([StarterPid, SupPid]).
 1474: 
 1475: 
 1476: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1477: %% Test the simple_one_for_one base case.
 1478: simple_one_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1479:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1480:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1481: 	     worker, []},
 1482:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1483:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1484:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1485: 
 1486:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1487: 
 1488:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1489:     if length(Children) == 2 ->
 1490: 	    case lists:keysearch(CPid2, 2, Children) of
 1491: 		{value, _} -> ok;
 1492: 		_ ->  ct:fail(bad_child)
 1493: 	    end;
 1494:        true ->  ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1495:     end,
 1496:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1497: 
 1498:     %% Test restart frequency property
 1499:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1500: 
 1501:     [{Id4, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1502: 
 1503:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, Id4, abnormal),
 1504:     check_exit_reason(SupPid,shutdown).
 1505: 
 1506: 
 1507: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1508: %% Test simple_one_for_one children restarts and returning ignore.
 1509: simple_one_for_one_restart_ignore(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1510:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1511:     Self = self(),
 1512:     lists:foreach(
 1513:         fun(Restart) ->
 1514:             Child = {child, {supervisor_3, start_child, []}, Restart, 1000, worker, []},
 1515:             {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 10, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1516:             StarterPid1 = spawn_link(fun() -> supervisor:start_child(SupPid, [child1, Self]) end),
 1517:             ChildPid1 = receive {child1, CPid1} -> CPid1 end,
 1518:             ChildPid1 ! {{ok, 0}, Self},
 1519:             check_exit([StarterPid1]),
 1520:             [{undefined, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1521:             terminate(ChildPid1, kill),
 1522:             ChildPid2 = receive {child1, CPid2} -> CPid2 end,
 1523:             ChildPid2 ! {{ok, 0}, Self},
 1524:             [{undefined, ChildPid2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1525:             terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 1526:             ChildPid3 = receive {child1, CPid3} -> CPid3 end,
 1527:             ChildPid3 ! {ignore, Self},
 1528:             [] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1529:             terminate(SupPid, shutdown),
 1530:             ok = check_exit_reason(SupPid, shutdown)
 1531:         end,
 1532:         [transient, permanent]
 1533:     ).
 1534: 
 1535: 
 1536: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1537: %% Test simple_one_for_one children shutdown accordingly to the
 1538: %% supervisor's shutdown strategy.
 1539: simple_one_for_one_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1540:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1541:     ShutdownTime = 1000,
 1542:     Child = {child, {supervisor_2, start_child, []},
 1543:              permanent, 2*ShutdownTime, worker, []},
 1544:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1545: 
 1546:     %% Will be gracefully shutdown
 1547:     {ok, _CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [ShutdownTime]),
 1548:     {ok, _CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [ShutdownTime]),
 1549: 
 1550:     %% Will be killed after 2*ShutdownTime milliseconds
 1551:     {ok, _CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [5*ShutdownTime]),
 1552: 
 1553:     {T, ok} = timer:tc(fun terminate/2, [SupPid, shutdown]),
 1554:     if T < 1000*ShutdownTime ->
 1555:             %% Because supervisor's children wait before exiting, it can't
 1556:             %% terminate quickly
 1557:             ct:fail({shutdown_too_short, T});
 1558:        T >= 1000*5*ShutdownTime ->
 1559:             ct:fail({shutdown_too_long, T});
 1560:        true ->
 1561:             check_exit([SupPid])
 1562:     end.
 1563: 
 1564: 
 1565: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1566: %% Tests automatic restart of children who's start function return
 1567: %% extra info.
 1568: simple_one_for_one_extra(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1569:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1570:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, [extra_info]}, 
 1571: 	     permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1572:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1573:     {ok, CPid1, extra_info} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1574:     {ok, CPid2, extra_info} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1575:     link(CPid2),
 1576:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1577:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1578:     if length(Children) == 2 ->
 1579: 	    case lists:keysearch(CPid2, 2, Children) of
 1580: 		{value, _} -> ok;
 1581: 		_ ->  ct:fail(bad_child)
 1582: 	    end;
 1583:        true ->  ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1584:     end,
 1585:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1586:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1587:     [{Id4, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1588:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, Id4, abnormal),
 1589:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1590: 
 1591: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1592: %% Test for subtle corruption of internal state for a
 1593: %% simple_one_for_one supervisor. Thanks to Zeyu Zhang (@zzydxm) and
 1594: %% Maxim Fedorov for noticing this bug. (OTP-16804)
 1595: simple_one_for_one_corruption(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1596:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1597: 
 1598:     logger:add_handler(?MODULE, ?MODULE, #{test_case_pid => self()}),
 1599: 
 1600:     try
 1601:         Child = #{id => child, start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1602:                   restart => temporary, shutdown => 1000,
 1603:                   type => worker, modules => []},
 1604:         {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1605:         {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1606: 
 1607:         terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1608: 
 1609:         %% The first time a child of simple_one_for_one supervisor
 1610:         %% with restart strategy `temporary` dies, the internal state
 1611:         %% for the supervisor will become inconsistent (the `dynamics`
 1612:         %% field would change from `{mapsets,Map}` to
 1613:         %% `{maps,Map}`). That inconsistency will make the supervisor
 1614:         %% retain the start arguments even for temporary processes.
 1615:         %%
 1616:         %% To test that the bug is fixed, start a new child process
 1617:         %% with a large term in its argument list.
 1618: 
 1619:         N = 50000,
 1620:         BigData = binary_to_list(<<0:N/unit:8>>),
 1621:         {ok, CPid2, BigData} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [BigData]),
 1622: 
 1623:         %% Since the child is temporary, the supervisor should not keep
 1624:         %% the argument list for the child and the supervisor's heap
 1625:         %% size should shrink after a GC.
 1626: 
 1627:         true = erlang:garbage_collect(SupPid),
 1628:         {total_heap_size, HeapSize} = process_info(SupPid, total_heap_size),
 1629:         if
 1630:             HeapSize > 2*N ->
 1631:                 %% The start arguments for the child have been kept.
 1632:                 ct:fail({excessive_heap_size,HeapSize});
 1633:             true ->
 1634:                 ok
 1635:         end,
 1636: 
 1637:         terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1638: 
 1639:         exit(SupPid, kill)
 1640:     after
 1641:         logger:remove_handler(?MODULE)
 1642:     end,
 1643: 
 1644:     ok.
 1645: 
 1646: 
 1647: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1648: %% Test restart escalation on a simple_one_for_one supervisor.
 1649: simple_one_for_one_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1650:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1651:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1652: 	     worker, []},
 1653:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 4, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1654:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [error]),
 1655:     link(CPid1),
 1656:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1657:     link(CPid2),
 1658: 
 1659:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child, abnormal),
 1660:     check_exit([SupPid, CPid2]).
 1661: 
 1662: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1663: %% Test the rest_for_one base case.
 1664: rest_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1665:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1666:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1667: 	     worker, []},
 1668:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1669: 	     worker, []},
 1670:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1671: 	     worker, []},
 1672:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1673:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1674:     link(CPid1),
 1675:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1676:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child3),
 1677:     link(CPid3),
 1678:     [3,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1679: 
 1680:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1681: 
 1682:     %% Check that Cpid3 did die
 1683:     check_exit([CPid3]),
 1684: 
 1685:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1686:     is_in_child_list([CPid1], Children),
 1687: 
 1688:     if length(Children) == 3 ->
 1689: 	    ok;
 1690:        true ->
 1691: 	    ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1692:     end,
 1693:     [3,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1694: 
 1695:     %% Test that no old children is still alive
 1696:     Pids = lists:map(fun({_,P,_,_}) -> P end, Children),
 1697:     not_in_child_list([CPid2, CPid3], Pids),
 1698:     in_child_list([CPid1], Pids),
 1699: 
 1700:     %% Test restart frequency property
 1701:     [{child3, Pid3, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1702: 
 1703:     terminate(SupPid, Pid3, child3, abnormal),
 1704: 
 1705:     [_,{child2, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1706: 
 1707:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, child2, abnormal),
 1708:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1709: 
 1710: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1711: %% Test restart escalation on a rest_for_one supervisor.
 1712: rest_for_one_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1713:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1714:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1715: 	     worker, []},
 1716:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1717: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1718: 	     worker, []},
 1719:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1720:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1721:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1722:     link(CPid2),
 1723: 
 1724:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1725:     check_exit([CPid2, SupPid]).
 1726: 
 1727: 
 1728: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1729: %% Test that the supervisor terminates a restarted child when a different
 1730: %% child fails to start.
 1731: rest_for_one_other_child_fails_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1732:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1733:     Self = self(),
