 3009:                          {errorContext,Error},
 3010:                          {reason,Term},
 3011:                          {offender,Child2}]},
 3012:     Str7 = flatten_format_log(Report2, FormatOpts6),
 3013:     L7 = length(Str7),
 3014:     ct:log("Str7: ~ts", [Str7]),
 3015:     ct:log("length(Str7): ~p", [L7]),
 3016:     true = string:find(Str7, "Offender: id=any_id,nb_children=7.") =/= nomatch,
 3017: 
 3018:     ok.
 3019: 
 3020: flatten_format_log(Report, Format) ->
 3021:     lists:flatten(supervisor:format_log(Report, Format)).
 3022: 
 3023: % Test that terminations of temporary non-significant children do not
 3024: % trigger auto-shutdown regardless of the supervisor's auto_shutdown
 3025: % mode.
 3026: nonsignificant_temporary(_Config) ->
 3027:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3028:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3029: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3030: 	       restart => temporary,
 3031: 	       significant => false},
 3032: 
 3033:     lists:foreach(
 3034: 	fun (AutoShutdown) ->
 3035: 	    {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3036: 
 3037: 	    % Terminating a temporary non-significant child via the supervisor
 3038: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3039: 	    {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3040: 	    link(ChildPid1),
 3041: 	    terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1, child1, supervisor),
 3042: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3043: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3044: 
 3045: 	    % Killing a temporary non-significant child should not trigger
 3046: 	    % auto-shutdown.
 3047: 	    {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3048: 	    link(ChildPid2),
 3049: 	    terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3050: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3051: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3052: 
 3053: 	    % Abnormal termination of a temporary non-significant child
 3054: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3055: 	    {ok, ChildPid3} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3056: 	    link(ChildPid3),
 3057: 	    terminate(ChildPid3, abnormal),
 3058: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3059: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3060: 
 3061: 	    % Normal termination of a temporary non-significant child
 3062: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3063: 	    {ok, ChildPid4} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3064: 	    link(ChildPid4),
 3065: 	    terminate(ChildPid4, normal),
 3066: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid4]),
 3067: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3068: 
 3069: 	    terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3070: 	    ok = check_exit([Sup1])
 3071: 	end,
 3072: 	[never, any_significant, all_significant]),
 3073: 
 3074:     ok.
 3075: 
 3076: % Test that terminations of transient non-significant children do not
 3077: % trigger auto-shutdown regardless of the supervisor's auto_shutdown
 3078: % mode.
 3079: nonsignificant_transient(_Config) ->
 3080:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3081:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3082: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3083: 	       restart => transient,
 3084: 	       significant => false},
 3085: 
 3086:     lists:foreach(
 3087: 	fun (AutoShutdown) ->
 3088: 	    {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3089: 					    auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3090: 
 3091: 	    % Terminating a transient non-significant child via the supervisor
 3092: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3093: 	    {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3094: 	    link(ChildPid1),
 3095: 	    terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1, child1, supervisor),
 3096: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3097: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3098: 
 3099: 	    % Killing a transient non-significant child should not trigger
 3100: 	    % auto-shutdown. The killed child should be restarted.
 3101: 	    {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3102: 	    link(ChildPid2),
 3103: 	    terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3104: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3105: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3106: 
 3107: 	    % Abnormal termination of a transient non-significant child should
 3108: 	    % not trigger auto-shutdown. The terminated child should be restarted.
 3109: 	    [{child1, ChildPid3, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3110: 	    link(ChildPid3),
 3111: 	    terminate(ChildPid3, abnormal),
 3112: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3113: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3114: 
 3115: 	    % Normal termination of a transient non-significant child should not
 3116: 	    % trigger  auto-shutdown.
 3117: 	    [{child1, ChildPid4, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3118: 	    link(ChildPid4),
 3119: 	    terminate(ChildPid4, normal),
 3120: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid4]),
 3121: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3122: 
 3123: 	    terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3124: 	    ok = check_exit([Sup1])
 3125: 	end,
 3126: 	[never, any_significant, all_significant]),
 3127: 
 3128:     ok.
 3129: 
 3130: % Test the auto-shutdown feature with temporary significant children.
 3131: significant_temporary(_Config) ->
 3132:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3133:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3134: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3135: 	       restart => temporary,
 3136: 	       significant => true},
 3137:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3138: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3139: 	       restart => temporary,
 3140: 	       significant => true},
 3141:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3142: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3143: 	       restart => temporary,
 3144: 	       significant => false},
 3145: 
 3146:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of any significant child.
 3147: 
 3148:     % Terminating a temporary significant child via the supervisor should not
 3149:     % trigger auto-shutdown.
 3150:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3151: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3152:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3153:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3154:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child3),
 3155:     [{child3, ChildPid1_3, _, _},
 3156:      {child2, ChildPid1_2, _, _},
 3157:      {child1, ChildPid1_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3158:     link(ChildPid1_1),
 3159:     link(ChildPid1_2),
 3160:     link(ChildPid1_3),
 3161:     terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1_1, child1, supervisor),
 3162:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1_1]),
 3163:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_2], 1000),
 3164:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_3], 1000),
 3165:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3166: 
 3167:     % Killing a temporary significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3168:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3169:     [{child1, ChildPid2_1, _, _},
 3170:      {child3, ChildPid2_3, _, _},
 3171:      {child2, ChildPid2_2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3172:     link(ChildPid2_1),
 3173:     link(ChildPid2_2),
 3174:     link(ChildPid2_3),
 3175:     terminate(ChildPid2_1, kill),
 3176:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2_1, ChildPid2_2, ChildPid2_3, Sup1]),
 3177: 
 3178:     % Abnormal termination of a temporary significant child should trigger
 3179:     % auto-shutdown.
 3180:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3181: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3182:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child1),
 3183:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child2),
 3184:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child3),
 3185:     [{child3, ChildPid3_3, _, _},
 3186:      {child2, ChildPid3_2, _, _},
 3187:      {child1, ChildPid3_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3188:     link(ChildPid3_1),
 3189:     link(ChildPid3_2),
 3190:     link(ChildPid3_3),
 3191:     terminate(ChildPid3_1, abnormal),
 3192:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3_1, ChildPid3_2, ChildPid3_3, Sup2]),
 3193: 
 3194:     % Normal termination of a temporary significant child should trigger
 3195:     % auto-shutdown.
 3196:     {ok, Sup3} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3197: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3198:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child1),
 3199:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child2),
 3200:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child3),
 3201:     [{child3, ChildPid4_3, _, _},
 3202:      {child2, ChildPid4_2, _, _},
 3203:      {child1, ChildPid4_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup3),
 3204:     link(ChildPid4_1),
 3205:     link(ChildPid4_2),
 3206:     link(ChildPid4_3),
 3207:     terminate(ChildPid4_1, normal),
 3208:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid4_1, ChildPid4_2, ChildPid4_3, Sup3]),
 3209: 
 3210:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of all significant children.
 3211: 
 3212:     {ok, Sup4} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3213: 				    auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3214: 
 3215:     % The termination of only one of the two significant children should
 3216:     % not trigger auto-shutdown. The termination of the second (last of the two)
 3217:     % significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3218:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child1),
 3219:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child2),
 3220:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child3),
 3221:     [{child3, ChildPid5_3, _, _},
 3222:      {child2, ChildPid5_2, _, _},
 3223:      {child1, ChildPid5_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup4),
 3224:     link(ChildPid5_1),
 3225:     link(ChildPid5_2),
 3226:     link(ChildPid5_3),
 3227:     terminate(ChildPid5_1, normal),
 3228:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_1]),
 3229:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_2], 1000),
 3230:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_3], 1000),
 3231:     error = check_exit([Sup4], 1000),
 3232:     terminate(ChildPid5_2, normal),
 3233:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_2, ChildPid5_3, Sup4]),
 3234: 
 3235:     ok.
 3236: 
 3237: % Test the auto-shutdown feature with transient significant children.
 3238: significant_transient(_Config) ->
 3239:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3240:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3241:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3242:                restart => transient,
 3243:                significant => true},
 3244:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3245:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3246:                restart => transient,
 3247:                significant => true},
 3248:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3249:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3250:                restart => transient,
 3251:                significant => false},
 3252: 
 3253:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of any significant child.
 3254: 
 3255:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3256: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3257: 
 3258:     % Terminating a transient significant child via the supervisor should not
 3259:     % trigger auto-shutdown.
 3260:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3261:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3262:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child3),
 3263:     [{child3, ChildPid1_3, _, _},
 3264:      {child2, ChildPid1_2, _, _},
 3265:      {child1, ChildPid1_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3266:     link(ChildPid1_1),
 3267:     link(ChildPid1_2),
 3268:     link(ChildPid1_3),
 3269:     terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1_1, child1, supervisor),
 3270:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1_1]),
 3271:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_2], 1000),
 3272:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_3], 1000),
 3273:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3274:     supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3275: 
 3276:     % Killing a transient significant child should not trigger
 3277:     % auto-shutdown. The killed child should be restarted.
 3278:     [{child3, ChildPid2_3, _, _},
 3279:      {child2, ChildPid2_2, _, _},
 3280:      {child1, ChildPid2_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3281:     link(ChildPid2_1),
 3282:     link(ChildPid2_2),
 3283:     link(ChildPid2_3),
 3284:     terminate(ChildPid2_1, kill),
 3285:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2_1]),
 3286:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2_2], 1000),
 3287:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2_3], 1000),
 3288:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3289: 
 3290:     % Abnormal termination of a transient significant child should not trigger
 3291:     % auto-shutdown. The terminated child should be restarted.
 3292:     [{child3, ChildPid3_3, _, _},
 3293:      {child2, ChildPid3_2, _, _},
 3294:      {child1, ChildPid3_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3295:     link(ChildPid3_1),
 3296:     link(ChildPid3_2),
 3297:     link(ChildPid3_3),
 3298:     terminate(ChildPid3_1, abnormal),
 3299:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3_1]),
 3300:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3_2], 1000),
 3301:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3_3], 1000),
 3302:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3303: 
 3304:     % Normal termination of a transient significant child should trigger
 3305:     % auto-shutdown.
 3306:     [{child3, ChildPid4_3, _, _},
 3307:      {child2, ChildPid4_2, _, _},
 3308:      {child1, ChildPid4_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3309:     link(ChildPid4_1),
 3310:     link(ChildPid4_2),
 3311:     link(ChildPid4_3),
 3312:     terminate(ChildPid4_1, normal),
 3313:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid4_1, ChildPid4_2, ChildPid4_3, Sup1]),
 3314: 
 3315:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of all significant children.
 3316: 
 3317:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3318: 				    auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3319: 
 3320:     % The termination of only one of the two significant children should
 3321:     % not trigger auto-shutdown. The termination of the second (last of the two)
 3322:     % significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3323:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child1),
 3324:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child2),
 3325:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child3),
 3326:     [{child3, ChildPid5_3, _, _},
 3327:      {child2, ChildPid5_2, _, _},
 3328:      {child1, ChildPid5_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3329:     link(ChildPid5_1),
 3330:     link(ChildPid5_2),
 3331:     link(ChildPid5_3),
 3332:     terminate(ChildPid5_1, normal),
 3333:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_1]),
 3334:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_2], 1000),
 3335:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_3], 1000),
 3336:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3337:     terminate(ChildPid5_2, normal),
 3338:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_2, ChildPid5_3, Sup2]),
 3339: 
 3340:     ok.
 3341: 
 3342: % The auto-shutdown feature is not allowed with simple_one_for_one supervisors.
 3343: significant_simple(_Config) ->
 3344:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3345:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3346: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 3347: 
 3348:     {error, {supervisor_data, {bad_combination, _}}} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3349:                                                                           auto_shutdown => any_significant},
 3350:                                                                         [Child1]}}),
 3351: 
 3352:     {error, {supervisor_data, {bad_combination, _}}} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3353:                                                                           auto_shutdown => all_significant},
 3354:                                                                         [Child1]}}),
 3355: 
 3356:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3357:                                       auto_shutdown => never},
 3358:                                     [Child1]}}),
 3359:     terminate(SupPid, shutdown),
 3360:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 3361: 
 3362: % Test that terminations of significant children caused by
 3363: % the death of a sibling does not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3364: significant_bystander(_Config) ->
 3365:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3366:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3367:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3368:                restart => transient,
 3369:                significant => true},
 3370:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3371:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3372:                restart => transient,
 3373:                significant => false},
 3374:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3375:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3376:                restart => transient,
 3377:                significant => true},
 3378: 
 3379:     lists:foreach(
 3380:         fun ({Strategy, AutoShutdown}) ->
 3381:             {ok, Sup} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => Strategy,
 3382:                                            intensity => 5,
 3383:                                            auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3384:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child1),
 3385:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child2),
 3386:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child3),
 3387:             [{child3, ChildPid3, _, _},
 3388:              {child2, ChildPid2, _, _},
 3389:              {child1, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
 3390:             link(ChildPid1),
 3391:             link(ChildPid2),
 3392:             link(ChildPid3),
 3393:             terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3394:             _ = case Strategy of
 3395: 		one_for_one ->
 3396: 		    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3397: 		    error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3398: 		    error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000);
 3399:                 one_for_all ->
 3400:                     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, ChildPid3]);
 3401:                 rest_for_one ->
 3402:                     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, ChildPid3]),
 3403:                     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000)
 3404:             end,
 3405:             error = check_exit([Sup], 1000),
 3406:             terminate(Sup, shutdown),
 3407:             ok = check_exit([Sup])
 3408:         end,
 3409:         [
 3410:             {Strategy, AutoShutdown}
 3411:             ||
 3412:                 Strategy <- [one_for_one, one_for_all, rest_for_one],
 3413:                 AutoShutdown <- [any_significant, all_significant]
 3414:         ]
 3415:     ),
 3416: 
 3417:     ok.
 3418: 
 3419: % Test auto-shutdown escalation. 
 3420: significant_escalation(_Config) ->
 3421:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3422:     ChildSup1 = #{id => sup1,
 3423: 		  start => {supervisor,
 3424: 			    start_link,
 3425: 			    [?MODULE, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}]},
 3426: 		  restart => transient,
 3427:                   type => supervisor},
 3428:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3429:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3430:                restart => transient,
 3431:                significant => true},
 3432: 
 3433:     % Supervisor A has another supervisor B as a significant child, and supervisor B
 3434:     % has a worker C as a significant child. A and B have auto-shutdown enabled.
 3435:     % When C terminates, it should cause the auto-shutdown of B, and the termination
 3436:     % of B should in turn cause the auto-shutdown of A.
 3437:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3438:     {ok, ChildSupPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, ChildSup1#{significant => true}),
 3439:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(ChildSupPid1, Child1),
 3440:     link(ChildSupPid1),
 3441:     link(ChildPid1),
 3442:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3443:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildSupPid1, Sup1]),
 3444: 
 3445:     % Supervisor A has another supervisor B as a non-significant child, and supervisor B
 3446:     % has a worker C as a significant child. A and B have auto-shutdown enabled.
 3447:     % When C terminates, it should cause the auto-shutdown of B, but the termination
 3448:     % of B should not in turn cause the auto-shutdown of A.
 3449:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3450:     {ok, ChildSupPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup2, ChildSup1#{significant => false}),
 3451:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(ChildSupPid2, Child1),
 3452:     link(ChildSupPid2),
 3453:     link(ChildPid2),
 3454:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3455:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, ChildSupPid2]),
 3456:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3457:     terminate(Sup2, shutdown),
 3458:     ok = check_exit([Sup2]),
 3459: 
 3460:     ok.
 3461: 
 3462: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from never to any_significant.
 3463: significant_upgrade_never_any(_Config) ->
 3464:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3465:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3466: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3467: 	       restart => transient,
 3468: 	       significant => true},
 3469:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3470: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3471: 	       restart => transient,
 3472: 	       significant => true},
 3473:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3474:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3475:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3476:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3477:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3478:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3479:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3480:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3481:     link(ChildPid1),
 3482:     link(ChildPid2),
 3483:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3484:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3485:     ok.
 3486: 
 3487: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from any_significant to never.
 3488: significant_upgrade_any_never(_Config) ->
 3489:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3490:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3491: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3492: 	       restart => transient,
 3493: 	       significant => true},
 3494:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3495: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3496: 	       restart => transient,
 3497: 	       significant => true},
 3498:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3499:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3500:     link(ChildPid1),
 3501:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3502:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3503:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3504:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3505:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3506:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3507:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3508:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3509:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3510:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3511:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3512:     link(ChildPid2),
 3513:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3514:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3515:     ok.
 3516: 
 3517: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from never to all_significant.
 3518: significant_upgrade_never_all(_Config) ->
 3519:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3520:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3521: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3522: 	       restart => transient,
 3523: 	       significant => true},
 3524:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3525: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3526: 	       restart => transient,
 3527: 	       significant => true},
 3528:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3529:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3530:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3531:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3532:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3533:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3534:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3535:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3536:     link(ChildPid1),
 3537:     link(ChildPid2),
 3538:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3539:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3540:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3541:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3542:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3543:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3544:     ok.
 3545: 
 3546: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from all_significant to never.
 3547: significant_upgrade_all_never(_Config) ->
 3548:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3549:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3550: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3551: 	       restart => transient,
 3552: 	       significant => true},
 3553:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3554: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3555: 	       restart => transient,
 3556: 	       significant => true},
 3557:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3558:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3559:     link(ChildPid1),
 3560:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3561:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3562:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3563:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3564:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3565:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3566:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3567:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3568:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3569:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3570:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3571:     link(ChildPid2),
 3572:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3573:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3574:     ok.
 3575: 
 3576: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from any_significant to all_significant.
 3577: significant_upgrade_any_all(_Config) ->
 3578:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3579:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3580: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3581: 	       restart => transient,
 3582: 	       significant => true},
 3583:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3584: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3585: 	       restart => transient,
 3586: 	       significant => true},
 3587:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3588:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3589:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3590:     link(ChildPid1),
 3591:     link(ChildPid2),
 3592:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3593:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3594:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3595:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3596:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3597:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3598:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3599:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3600:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3601:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3602:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3603:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3604:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3605:     ok.
 3606: 
 3607: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from all_significant to any_significant.
 3608: significant_upgrade_all_any(_Config) ->
 3609:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3610:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3611: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3612: 	       restart => transient,
 3613: 	       significant => true},
 3614:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3615: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3616: 	       restart => transient,
 3617: 	       significant => true},
 3618:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3619:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3620:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3621:     link(ChildPid1),
 3622:     link(ChildPid2),
 3623:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3624:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3625:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3626:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3627:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3628:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3629:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3630:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3631:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3632:     ok.
 3633: 
 3634: % Test upgrading a child from non-significant to significant
 3635: % and vice versa.
 3636: significant_upgrade_child(_Config) ->
 3637:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3638:     Child1 = #{id => child,
 3639: 	      start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3640: 	      restart => transient,
 3641: 	      significant => false},
 3642:     Child2 = #{id => child,
 3643: 	      start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3644: 	      restart => transient,
 3645: 	      significant => true},
 3646: 
 3647:     % A supervisor with auto-shutdown set to never should not allow upgrading
 3648:     % a non-significant child to significant.
 3649:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [Child1]}}),
 3650:     [{child, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3651:     link(ChildPid1),
 3652:     S1_1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3653:     {error, _} = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [Child2]}}),
 3654:     S1_2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3655:     true = (S1_1 /= S1_2),
 3656:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3657:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3658:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3659:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, Sup1]),
 3660: 
 3661:     % Start with a non-significant child, upgrade it to significant
 3662:     % and ensure that it triggers auto-shutdown.
 3663:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child1]}}),
 3664:     [{child, ChildPid2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3665:     link(ChildPid2),
 3666:     S2_1 = sys:get_state(Sup2),
 3667:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup2, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child2]}}),
 3668:     S2_2 = sys:get_state(Sup2),
 3669:     true = (S2_1 /= S2_2),
 3670:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3671:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3672:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3673:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup2]),
 3674: 
 3675:     % Start with a significant child, upgrade it to non-significant
 3676:     % and ensure that it does not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3677:     {ok, Sup3} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child2]}}),
 3678:     [{child, ChildPid3, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup3),
 3679:     link(ChildPid3),
 3680:     S3_1 = sys:get_state(Sup3),
 3681:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup3, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child1]}}),
 3682:     S3_2 = sys:get_state(Sup3),
 3683:     true = (S3_1 /= S3_2),
 3684:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3], 1000),
 3685:     error = check_exit([Sup3], 1000),
 3686:     terminate(ChildPid3, normal),
 3687:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3688:     error = check_exit([Sup3], 1000),
 3689:     terminate(Sup3, shutdown),
 3690:     ok = check_exit([Sup3]),
 3691: 
 3692:     ok.
 3693: 
 3694: %% Test trying to start a child that uses an already registered name.
 3695: already_started_outside_supervisor(_Config) ->
 3696:     %% Avoid inter-testcase flakiness
 3697:     ensure_supervisor_is_stopped(),
 3698:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3699:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, []}}),
 3700:     RegName = registered_name,
 3701:     Child = #{id => child,
 3702: 	      start => {?MODULE, start_registered_name, [RegName]},
 3703: 	      restart => transient,
 3704: 	      significant => false},
 3705:     %% We start another process and register the name.
 3706:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3707:                              true = register(RegName, self()),
 3708:                              receive
 3709:                                  die -> ok
 3710:                              end
 3711:                      end),
 3712:     {error, {already_started, P}} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, Child),
 3713:     Pid = P,
 3714:     terminate(SupPid, shutdown),
 3715:     Pid ! die,
 3716:     ok = check_exit([SupPid]),
 3717:     ok.
 3718: 
 3719: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3720: terminate(Pid, Reason) when Reason =/= supervisor ->
 3721:     terminate(dummy, Pid, dummy, Reason).
 3722: 
 3723: terminate(Sup, _, ChildId, supervisor) ->
 3724:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(Sup, ChildId);
 3725: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, kill) ->
 3726:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3727:     exit(ChildPid, kill),
 3728:     receive
 3729: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, killed} ->
 3730: 	    ok
 3731:     end;
 3732: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, shutdown) ->
 3733:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3734:     exit(ChildPid, shutdown),
 3735:     receive
 3736: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, shutdown} ->
 3737: 	    ok
 3738:     end;
 3739: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, {shutdown, Term}) ->
 3740:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3741:     exit(ChildPid, {shutdown, Term}),
 3742:     receive
 3743: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, {shutdown, Term}} ->
 3744: 	    ok
 3745:     end;
 3746: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, normal) ->
 3747:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3748:     ChildPid ! stop,
 3749:     receive
 3750: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, normal} ->
 3751: 	    ok
 3752:     end;
 3753: terminate(_, ChildPid, _,abnormal) ->
 3754:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3755:     ChildPid ! die,
 3756:     receive
 3757: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, died} ->
 3758: 	    ok
 3759:     end.
 3760: 
 3761: in_child_list([], _) ->
 3762:     true;
 3763: in_child_list([Pid | Rest], Pids) ->
 3764:     case is_in_child_list(Pid, Pids) of
 3765: 	true ->
 3766: 	    in_child_list(Rest, Pids);
 3767: 	false ->
 3768: 	    ct:fail(child_should_be_alive)
 3769:     end.
 3770: not_in_child_list([], _) ->
 3771:     true;
 3772: not_in_child_list([Pid | Rest], Pids) ->
 3773:     case is_in_child_list(Pid, Pids) of
 3774: 	true ->
 3775: 	    ct:fail(child_should_not_be_alive);
 3776: 	false ->
 3777: 	    not_in_child_list(Rest, Pids)
 3778:     end.
 3779: 
 3780: is_in_child_list(Pid, ChildPids) ->
 3781:     lists:member(Pid, ChildPids).
 3782: 
 3783: check_exit(Pids) ->
 3784:     check_exit(Pids, infinity).
 3785: 
 3786: check_exit([], _Timeout) ->
 3787:     ok;
 3788: check_exit([Pid | Pids], Timeout) ->
 3789:     receive
 3790: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _} ->
 3791: 	    check_exit(Pids, Timeout)
 3792:     after Timeout ->
 3793: 	error
 3794:     end.
 3795: 
 3796: check_exit_reason(Pid, Reason) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 3797:     receive
 3798: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
 3799: 	    ok;
 3800: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Else} ->
 3801: 	    ct:fail({bad_exit_reason, Else})
 3802:     end.
 3803: 
 3804: check_no_exit(Timeout) ->
 3805:     receive
 3806:         {'EXIT', Pid, _} = Exit when is_pid(Pid) ->
 3807:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Exit})
 3808:     after Timeout ->
 3809:             ok
 3810:     end.
 3811: 
 3812: start_registered_name(Name) ->
 3813:     supervisor:start_link({local, Name}, ?MODULE, []).
 3814: 
 3815: ensure_supervisor_is_stopped() ->
 3816:     case whereis(sup_test) of
 3817:         undefined ->
 3818:             ok;
 3819:         Pid ->
 3820:             terminate(Pid, shutdown)
 3821:     end.
